Package org.sbml.jsbml.ext.render.director

Class SimpleLayoutAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sbml.jsbml.ext.render.director.SimpleLayoutAlgorithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LayoutAlgorithm

    public abstract class SimpleLayoutAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object
implements LayoutAlgorithm
    SimpleLayoutAlgorithm is a partial implementation of the LayoutAlgorithm interface which collects functions which are independent of the output format of the LayoutDirector.
    Since:
    1.4
    Author:
    Andreas Dräger

        Parameters:

      • correctDimensions

        public void correctDimensions​(GraphicalObject glyph)
        Correct the dimensions of a GraphicalObject by changing its BoundingBox. According to the SBGN specification, some objects have to be represented as a circle or square and not as an ellipse or rectangle. fit to the glyph. If not this method corrects the layout informations.
        Parameters:
        glyph - the GraphicalObject for which to correct the dimensions
